backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented UI features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of key frontend components and feature modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the app’s light and dark theme palettes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root mount node and script loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing header, hero, trending books, footer, and cart panel within a cart provider.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Displays a book’s cover, title, and author with a button to add it to the cart.
frontend/src/components/CartPanel.tsx: Sliding cart panel showing cart items with controls for quantity, removal, and checkout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with logo, navigation links, and a cart button showing item count.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headline, description, and button to scroll to trending books.
frontend/src/components/TrendingBooks.ts: Renders the Trending Books section as a responsive grid of BookCard components.
frontend/src/features/books/trendingBook: Static list of four trending books with metadata and cover image paths.
frontend/src/features/cart/cartStore.tsx: React cart context with sessionStorage persistence supporting add, remove, and quantity updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for a warm bookstore-themed light and dark color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins aligned with the bookstore theme.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and image assets for the bookstore web app.
